text: Random Q: I imported an audio file in Pluto, and it's cool that I get a player. I kind of wanted a wavefrorm, and found this in JS -- anyone else interested in it? <https://wavesurfer-js.org/>

elements.text: Random Q: I imported an audio file in Pluto, and it's cool that I get a player. I kind of wanted a wavefrorm, and found this in JS -- anyone else interested in it?

text:
I hate to derail but how did you import the audio file in the first place?

And that visualizer looks very cool. Would be a great addition.

elements.text:
I hate to derail but how did you import the audio file in the first place?

And that visualizer looks very cool. Would be a great addition.

text: I just imported the file (in my case, FLAC, so loaded FIloIO and LibSndFile) and called load.
